Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394015) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394015)
